APIToken.description: API key value must be prefixed with \"Token \".
APIToken.name: Authorization

metaDescription: Snyk helps software-driven businesses develop fast and stay secure. Continuously find and fix vulnerabilities for npm, Maven, NuGet, RubyGems, PyPI and more.

methods.description: Get a custom base image collection

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The requested version of the endpoint to process the request

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: Return the page of results immediately after this cursor

parameters.name: endingBefore
parameters.description: Return the page of results immediately before this cursor

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The ID of the container project that the custom base image is based off of.

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: The organization ID of the custom base image

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The group ID of the custom base image

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The image repository

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The image tag

parameters.name: includeInRecommendations
parameters.description: Whether this image should be recommended as a base image upgrade

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Which column to sort by. 
If sorting by version, the versioning schema is used.

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Which direction to sort

methods.description: Search Group audit logs.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The requested version of the endpoint to process the request

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Group.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The ID for the next page of results.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start date (inclusive) of the audit logs search. Example: 2023-07-27

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end date (inclusive) of the audit logs search. Example: 2023-07-27

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order in which results are returned.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Filter logs by user ID.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Filter logs by project ID.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Filter logs by event type, cannot be used in conjunction with exclude_event parameter.

parameters.name: excludeEvent
parameters.description: Exclude event type from results, cannot be used in conjunctions with event parameter.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: If set, only return organizations within the specified group

parameters.name: isPersonal
parameters.description: If true, only return organizations that are not part of a group.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Only return orgs whose slug exactly matches this value.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Only return orgs whose name contains this value.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand the specified related resources in the response to include their attributes.

methods.description: List issues for a package

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The requested version of the endpoint to process the request

parameters.name: purl
parameters.description: A URI-encoded Package URL (purl). Supported purl types are apk, cargo, cocoapods, composer, deb, gem, generic, golang, hex, maven, npm, nuget, pub, pypi, rpm, and swift. A version for the package is also required.

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for an organization

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to skip before returning results. Must be greater than or equal to 0. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return. Must be greater than 0 and less than 1000. Default is 1000.
